articles.title: Optus boss takes aim at Netflix's 'free go' on data usage - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Optus boss Kelly Bayer Rosmarin says video-streaming services like Netflix need to do more to take the pressure off broadband networks.
articles.content:
"At the moment they see bandwidth usage as a free go."
Netflix was the first service in Australia to reduce the data its streaming service consumed in a bid to reduce broadband congestion at the sta… [+1753 chars]
